# Source: ska-mid-cbf-fhs-vcc/charts/ska-tango-base/templates/databaseds.yaml
# databaseds configurations
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ds-config-release-name
  namespace: default
  labels:
    component: databaseds
    function: tangodb-interface
    domain: tango-configuration
    intent: production

data:
  is-alive.sh: |
    #!/usr/bin/env bash
    set -o errexit -o pipefail
    [ -f "${HOME}/.bash_profile" ] && source "${HOME}/.bash_profile"
    TANGO_HOST=tango-databaseds-test.default.svc.cluster.local:10000 tango_admin --ping-device sys/database/2
---
# Source: ska-mid-cbf-fhs-vcc/charts/ska-tango-base/templates/deviceservers.yaml
# Device Server configuration
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: tangotest-release-name-dsconfig-json
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: ska-tango-charts
    component: configurator
    function: deployment
    intent: enabling
    domain: self-configuration
data:
  configuration.json: |
    {
      "servers": {
        "TangoTest": {
          "test": {
            "TangoTest": {
              "sys/tg_test/1": {}
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  bootstrap.sh: |
    #/bin/sh
    json2tango -w -a -u data/configuration.json
    rc=$?
    if [ $rc -eq 0 ]; then
      echo "finished normally."
      exit 0
    else
      if [ $rc -eq 2 ]; then
        echo "finished with an update."
        exit 0
      else
        echo "finished with an ERROR."
        exit $rc
      fi
    fi
  TangoTest.py: |
    
    #!/usr/bin/env python
    
    import importlib
    import importlib.util
    from tango.server import run
    
    classes = []
    
    def main(args=None, **kwargs):
      
      return run(classes=(classes), args=args, **kwargs)
    
    if __name__ == '__main__':
        main()

# Source: ska-mid-cbf-fhs-vcc/templates/deploy-standalone.yaml
# Device Server configuration
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: fhs-vcc-unit-1-1-release-name-dsconfig-json
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: ska-mid-cbf-fhs-vcc
    component: configurator
    function: deployment
    intent: enabling
    domain: self-configuration
data:
  configuration.json: |
    {
      "servers": {
        "FhsVccStackDeviceServer": {
          "vcc-1": {
            "VCCAllBandsController": {
              "fhs/vcc-all-bands/001": {
                "properties": {
                  "bitstream_id": [
                    "agilex-vcc"
                  ],
                  "bitstream_path": [
                    "/app/mnt/bitstream"
                  ],
                  "bitstream_version": [
                    "0.1.1"
                  ],
                  "bmc_endpoint_id": [
                    "127.0.1.1"
                  ],
                  "device_gitlab_hash": [
                    "0"
                  ],
                  "device_id": [
                    "1"
                  ],
                  "device_version_num": [
                    "0.0.1"
                  ],
                  "emulation_mode": [
                    "0"
                  ],
                  "emulator_base_url": [
                    "ska-mid-cbf-emulators.svc.cluster.local:5001"
                  ],
                  "emulator_id": [
                    "vcc-emulator-1"
                  ],
                  "emulator_ip_block_id": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "firmware_ip_block_id": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "fpga_number": [
                    "1"
                  ],
                  "ip_blocks": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "logging_level": [
                    "INFO"
                  ],
                  "network_switch_id": [
                    "127.0.0.1"
                  ],
                  "simulation_mode": [
                    "1"
                  ],
                  "unit_number": [
                    "1"
                  ]
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  bootstrap.sh: |
    #/bin/sh
    json2tango -w -a -u data/configuration.json
    rc=$?
    if [ $rc -eq 0 ]; then
      echo "finished normally."
      exit 0
    else
      if [ $rc -eq 2 ]; then
        echo "finished with an update."
        exit 0
      else
        echo "finished with an ERROR."
        exit $rc
      fi
    fi
  FhsVccStackDeviceServer.py: |
    
    #!/usr/bin/env python
    
    import importlib
    import importlib.util
    from tango.server import run
    
    classes = []
    
    def main(args=None, **kwargs):
      
      return run(classes=(classes), args=args, **kwargs)
    
    if __name__ == '__main__':
        main()

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: tango-databaseds-test
  namespace: default
  labels:
    component: databaseds
    function: tangodb-interface
    domain: tango-configuration
    intent: production
    app: ska-tango-charts

spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: databaseds
      function: tangodb-interface
      domain: tango-configuration
      intent: production
      app: ska-tango-charts
  serviceName: tango-databaseds-test
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: databaseds
        function: tangodb-interface
        domain: tango-configuration
        intent: production
        app: ska-tango-charts

    spec:
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: ds-config-release-name
          defaultMode: 0777
        name: databaseds-script
      containers:
      - name: databaseds
        image: "artefact.skao.int/ska-tango-images-tango-cpp:9.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /is-alive.sh
          subPath: is-alive.sh
          name: databaseds-script
        command:
          - retry 
          - --tries=10
          - --sleep=5
          - --

          - /usr/local/bin/wait-for-it.sh #  ST-1064: allow the file to not exist if running on min

          - ska-tango-base-tangodb:3306
          - --timeout=60
          - --strict
          - --
          - /usr/local/bin/DataBaseds
          - "2"
          - -ORBendPoint
          - giop:tcp::10000
          - -ORBendPointPublish
          - giop:tcp:$(TANGO_SERVER_PUBLISH_HOSTNAME):10000
        env:
          - name: MYSQL_HOST
            value: "ska-tango-base-tangodb:3306"
          - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
            value: "tango"
          - name: MYSQL_USER
            value: "tango"
          - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
            value: "tango"  # ST-1064: Check if this overwrites the injected value            
          - name: TANGO_SERVER_PUBLISH_HOSTNAME
            value: tango-databaseds-test.default.svc.cluster.local            
        ports:
        - name: ds
          containerPort: 10000
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 10000
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 1
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command: 
            - /is-alive.sh
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 1
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            ephemeral-storage: 512Mi
            memory: 128Mi

# Source: ska-mid-cbf-fhs-vcc/charts/ska-tango-base/templates/deviceservers.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: tangotest-test
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: ska-tango-charts
    component: tangotest-test
    function: tango-test
    domain: tango-base
    subsystem: ska-tango-base

spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: tangotest-test
      subsystem: ska-tango-base
  serviceName: tangotest-test
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: tangotest-test
        function: tango-test
        domain: tango-base
        subsystem: ska-tango-base
        app: ska-tango-charts
    
    spec:
      volumes:
        - name: configuration
          configMap:
            name: tangotest-release-name-dsconfig-json
        
      serviceAccountName: tangotest-sa-release-name
      initContainers:
      - name: wait-for-configuration
        image: "artefact.skao.int/ska-ser-utils:0.1.0"
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        command:
          - sh
          - -c
        args:
          - kubectl wait job --for=jsonpath='{.status.succeeded}'=1 tangotest-release-name-config --timeout=120s || ( ! kubectl get job tangotest-release-name-config ); echo $?
      containers:
      - name: device-server
        image: "artefact.skao.int/ska-tango-images-tango-java:9.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        command:
          - retry
          - --sleep=1
          - --tries=100
          - --
          - /usr/local/bin/TangoTest
          - "test"
          - -ORBendPoint
          - giop:tcp::$(TANGO_SERVER_PORT)
          - -ORBendPointPublish
          - giop:tcp:$(TANGO_SERVER_PUBLISH_HOSTNAME):$(TANGO_SERVER_PORT)
        ports:
        - containerPort: 45450
          name: tango-server
        - containerPort: 45460
          name: tango-heartbeat
        - containerPort: 45470
          name: tango-event
        volumeMounts:
          - name: configuration
            mountPath: data
            readOnly: true
          
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 45450
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 1
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 45450
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 1
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        env:
        - name: TANGO_HOST
          value: tango-databaseds-test:10000
        - name: TANGO_SERVER_PORT
          value: "45450"
        - name: TANGO_ZMQ_HEARTBEAT_PORT
          value: "45460"
        - name: TANGO_ZMQ_EVENT_PORT
          value: "45470"
        - name: TANGO_SERVER_PUBLISH_HOSTNAME
          value: tangotest-test.default.svc.cluster.local
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 256Mi

# Source: ska-mid-cbf-fhs-vcc/templates/bitstream-download-job.yaml
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: bitstream-download-job
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: bitstream-download-job
          image: alpine:latest
          command: ["sh", "-c"]
          args:
            - |
              apk add --no-cache curl tar && \
              BITSTREAM_ID=agilex-vcc && \
              BITSTREAM_VER=0.1.1 && \
              BITSTREAM_SUBPATH=$BITSTREAM_ID/$BITSTREAM_VER && \
              echo "Downloading bitstream $BITSTREAM_SUBPATH" && \
              TARBALL="ska-mid-cbf-$BITSTREAM_ID-$BITSTREAM_VER.tar.gz" && \
              if [ ! -d /app/mnt/bitstream/$BITSTREAM_SUBPATH ]; then \
                curl -L -o /tmp/$TARBALL https://artefact.skao.int/repository/raw-internal/$TARBALL && \
                mkdir -p /app/mnt/bitstream/$BITSTREAM_SUBPATH && \
                tar xvzf /tmp/$TARBALL -C /app/mnt/bitstream/$BITSTREAM_SUBPATH  ; \
              fi && \
              BITSTREAM_ID=agilex-vcc && \
              BITSTREAM_VER=0.1.1 && \
              BITSTREAM_SUBPATH=$BITSTREAM_ID/$BITSTREAM_VER && \
              echo "Downloading bitstream $BITSTREAM_SUBPATH" && \
              TARBALL="ska-mid-cbf-$BITSTREAM_ID-$BITSTREAM_VER.tar.gz" && \
              if [ ! -d /app/mnt/bitstream/$BITSTREAM_SUBPATH ]; then \
                curl -L -o /tmp/$TARBALL https://artefact.skao.int/repository/raw-internal/$TARBALL && \
                mkdir -p /app/mnt/bitstream/$BITSTREAM_SUBPATH && \
                tar xvzf /tmp/$TARBALL -C /app/mnt/bitstream/$BITSTREAM_SUBPATH  ; \
              fi && \
              find /app/mnt/bitstream
          volumeMounts:
            - name: bitstream-pv
              mountPath: /app/mnt/bitstream
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
        - name: bitstream-pv
          persistentVolumeClaim:
            claimName: fhs-vcc-bitstream-pv

          - --max=60
          - --
          - sh
          - data/bootstrap.sh
        env:
        - name: TANGO_HOST
          value: tango-databaseds-test:10000
        volumeMounts:
          - name: configuration
            mountPath: data
            readOnly: true
      volumes:
        - name: configuration
          configMap:
            name: fhs-vcc-unit-2-6-release-name-dsconfig-json
      restartPolicy: Never
